```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(gganimate)
library(gifski)
climate_data <- read_csv("../datasets/climate_monthly.csv")
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
climate_data %>% 
  filter(Source == "GISTEMP") %>% 
  mutate(year = year(Date),
         month = month(Date))
```

```{r Visualisierung 1}
ggplot(climate_data) +
         geom_area(aes(x = Date, y = Mean, fill = Source)) +
   labs(title = "Durschnittlicher Temperaturanstieg", x = "Jahr", y = "Durchschnitt")
```

```{r Visualisierung 2}
ggplot(climate_data, aes(Date, Mean, group = Source)) +
  geom_line(aes(colour = Source), position = "stack") + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = Source), position = "stack") +
  facet_wrap(~ Source, nrow = 2) +
  labs(title = "", x = "Jahr", y = "Durchschnitt")
```
